vtkinit.cpp File Reference

Create new VTK handle. More...

Detailed Description

Create new VTK handle.

vtkinit creates a new handle and sets it as the current. It takes no arguments and returns the newly created handle.

% create explicit VTK handle
VTK = vtkinit;
VTK2 = vtkinit;

% new the current handle is identical to VTK2
if VTK2==gcvtk()
        disp('VTK2 is new the current handle.')
end
